name.baseName: Technical and economic evaluation of deep natural gas ; Volcanic reservoir ; Optimization of TOPSIS method
深层天然气技术经济评价 ; 火山岩储层;TOPSIS法优选

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: According to the principle and program of gas field development scheme design, the paper puts forward the key consideration problems in selecting development mode, dividing development series and determining development well pattern when designing the development scheme of Xingcheng volcanic reservoir, and optimizes the development scheme by using the improved TOPSIS method.
按照气田开发方案设计的原理和程序提出了兴城火山岩储层开发方案的设计时在选择开发方式、划分开发层系和确定开发井网这三个方面应重点的考虑问题并采用改进后的TOPSIS法对开发方案进行了优选。

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: Xingcheng gas field in Songliao basin

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: The so-called gas field development is based on the detailed exploration results and necessary productive development tests, on the basis of comprehensive research, according to the national requirements for natural gas production, and starting from the actual situation and production law of the gas field, a reasonable development scheme is worked out, and the gas field is constructed and put into production
所谓气田开发 就是依据详探结果和必要的生产性开发试验 在综合研究的基础上对具 有工业价值的气田 按照国家对天然气生产的要求 从气田的实际情况和生产规律出发 制定出合理的开发方案 并对气田进行建设和投产
technology.technologicalApplicability: The technical and economic evaluation process for deep natural gas in volcanic reservoirs, particularly regarding the Xingcheng gas field in the Songliao basin, involves selecting an optimal development mode, dividing development strata, and determining well patterns for extraction. This process utilizes the improved TOPSIS method for decision-making, and targets applications that include gas field development with considerations for industrial value and national production requirements for natural gas, adhering to technological, economic, quality, and efficiency standards. It is specifically suited for the development of gas fields with high formation pressure and without issues such as retrograde condensation or hydrogen sulfide corrosion, contributing to health, safety, and environmental protection standards.
本工艺对深层天然气进行技术经济评价，特别是松辽盆地兴城火山岩储层气田的开发。涉及选择最优开发方式、划分开发层系、确定开发井网模式。采用改进后的TOPSIS方法进行决策，目标应用包括有工业价值的气田开发，并遵循天然气国家生产要求、技术、经济、质量和效率标准。特别适用于高地层压力、无反凝析及硫化氢腐蚀问题的气田开发项目，并符合健康、安全和环保标准。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The natural gas in Xushen well area mainly contains methane 71.81%-80.23%, and there is no retrograde condensation phenomenon. Hydrogen sulfide corrosion will not occur. Formation pressure is as high as left and right elastic energy. Scorpion mining is more economical and simple than any other development methods
徐深井区天然气以甲烷 含71.81%-80.23%为主、均不会出现反凝析现象。不会出现硫化氢腐蚀现象。地层压力高达 左右 弹性能量大。衰蝎开采比其它任何开发方式都经济和简便易行
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataTreatmentAndExtrapolationsPrinciples: A gas field development plan should reflect technology, economy, quality, benefit and performance, etc. For a gas field that is in line with international standards, health, safety, environmental protection and other factors should be considered. The indexes designed by the scheme should conform to the national and industry standards and norms. The selection of indicators requires wide coverage and relative independence among indicators
一个气田开发方案应该反映出技术、经济、质量、效益性能等方面的内容对于一个和国际接轨的气田 还要考虑健康、安全、环保等方面的因素。方案所设计的指标要符合国家和行业标准、规范。指标的选取要求覆盖面广而且各个指标间是相对独立的

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 巩艳芬. 松辽盆地兴城气田火山岩储层天然气开发技术经济评价[D].大庆石油学院,2010.
巩艳芬. 松辽盆地兴城气田火山岩储层天然气开发技术经济评价[D].大庆石油学院,2010.

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When using the data set for the Xingcheng volcanic reservoir gas field development, users should ensure that the application of data aligns with the characteristics of the gas field as identified in the evaluation. This includes considering the specific composition of natural gas, absence of retrograde condensation and hydrogen sulfide corrosion, and the economic efficiency of scorpion mining methods. Users are advised to adhere to national and industry standards in applying this data and ensure independent selection of wide-ranging indexes for a comprehensive evaluation that supports decision-making in line with technological, economic, quality, and efficiency considerations, as well as health, safety, and environmental standards.
在使用兴城火山岩储层气田开发的数据集时，用户应确保数据的应用与评估中确定的气田特性相一致。包括考虑天然气的具体成分组合、无反凝析和硫化氢腐蚀现象、以及蝎式开采方法的经济效率。用户在应用这些数据时，须遵守国家和行业标准，并确保独立选择范围广泛的指标进行综合评估，支持按照技术、经济、质量和效率考虑以及健康、安全和环保标准的决策。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: Valuation mode, the data is distribution, and the data filled in the quantity is the result of averaging (median value)
估价模式,数据为分布，量中填写的数据为取平均（取中值）的结果
Not mentioned in the literature, assuming (1:1)
